segments.source_content: Component that wraps platform ScrollView while providing integration with touch locking "responder" system.

translations.zh-hant: 封裝平台原生 ScrollView 並整合觸控鎖定「響應者」系統的元件。

segments.source_content: Keep in mind that ScrollViews must have a bounded height in order to work, since they contain unbounded-height children into a bounded container (via a scroll interaction). In order to bound the height of a ScrollView, either set the height of the view directly (discouraged) or make sure all parent views have bounded height. Forgetting to transfer `{flex: 1}` down the view stack can lead to errors here, which the element inspector makes quick to debug.

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，ScrollView 必須具有固定高度才能正常運作，因為它們將無限高度的子元件裝載到有限容器中（透過滾動互動）。若要限制 ScrollView 的高度，可以直接設定視圖高度（不建議）或確保所有父視圖都具有固定高度。忘記將 `{flex: 1}` 向下傳遞至視圖結構可能導致錯誤，此時元素檢查器能快速協助除錯。

segments.source_content: Doesn't yet support other contained responders from blocking this scroll view from becoming the responder.

translations.zh-hant: 目前尚不支援其他內含的響應者阻止此滾動視圖成為主響應者。

segments.source_content: `ScrollView` renders all its react child components at once, but this has a performance downside.

translations.zh-hant: `ScrollView` 會一次性渲染所有子 React 元件，但這會帶來效能上的缺點。

segments.source_content: Imagine you have a very long list of items you want to display, maybe several screens worth of content. Creating JS components and native views for everything all at once, much of which may not even be shown, will contribute to slow rendering and increased memory usage.

translations.zh-hant: 設想您有一個非常長的項目列表需要顯示，內容可能橫跨多個螢幕。同時為所有內容建立 JS 元件和原生視圖（其中許多甚至不會立即顯示），將導致渲染速度變慢和記憶體使用量增加。

segments.source_content: This is where `FlatList` comes into play. `FlatList` renders items lazily, when they are about to appear, and removes items that scroll way off screen to save memory and processing time.

translations.zh-hant: 此時 `FlatList` 便派上用場。`FlatList` 會惰性渲染項目（僅在即將顯示時才渲染），並移除滾動超出螢幕範圍的項目以節省記憶體和處理時間。

segments.source_content: `FlatList` is also handy if you want to render separators between your items, multiple columns, infinite scroll loading, or any number of other features it supports out of the box.

translations.zh-hant: 若您需要渲染項目間分隔線、多欄佈局、無限滾動載入或其他開箱即用的功能，`FlatList` 也十分便利。

segments.source_content: A React Component that will be used to render sticky headers, should be used together with `stickyHeaderIndices`. You may need to set this component if your sticky header uses custom transforms, for example, when you want your list to have an animated and hidable header. If a component has not been provided, the default [`ScrollViewStickyHeader`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/Libraries/Components/ScrollView/ScrollViewStickyHeader.js) component will be used.

translations.zh-hant: 用於渲染黏性標頭的 React 元件，需與 `stickyHeaderIndices` 搭配使用。若您的黏性標頭使用自訂變形效果（例如想為列表添加可動畫顯示/隱藏的標頭），可能需要設定此元件。若未提供元件，將使用預設的 [`ScrollViewStickyHeader`](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/blob/main/packages/react-native/Libraries/Components/ScrollView/ScrollViewStickyHeader.js) 元件。

segments.source_content: When true, the scroll view bounces horizontally when it reaches the end even if the content is smaller than the scroll view itself.

translations.zh-hant: 設為 true 時，滾動視圖在到達水平邊界時會彈跳，即使內容小於滾動視圖本身。

segments.source_content: When true, the scroll view bounces vertically when it reaches the end even if the content is smaller than the scroll view itself.

translations.zh-hant: 設為 true 時，滾動視圖在到達垂直邊界時會彈跳，即使內容小於滾動視圖本身。

segments.source_content: Controls whether iOS should automatically adjust the content inset for scroll views that are placed behind a navigation bar or tab bar/toolbar.

translations.zh-hant: 控制 iOS 是否應自動調整位於導覽列或標籤列/工具列後方之滾動視圖的內容內嵌邊距。

segments.source_content: Controls whether the ScrollView should automatically adjust its `contentInset` and `scrollViewInsets` when the Keyboard changes its size.

translations.zh-hant: 控制當鍵盤尺寸變化時，ScrollView 是否應自動調整其 `contentInset` 與 `scrollViewInsets`。

segments.source_content: Controls whether iOS should automatically adjust the scroll indicator insets. See Apple's [documentation on the property](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit/uiscrollview/3198043-automaticallyadjustsscrollindica).

translations.zh-hant: 控制 iOS 是否應自動調整滾動指示器的內邊距。詳見 Apple 的[屬性說明文件](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit/uiscrollview/3198043-automaticallyadjustsscrollindica)。

segments.source_content: When true, the scroll view bounces when it reaches the end of the content if the content is larger than the scroll view along the axis of the scroll direction. When `false`, it disables all bouncing even if the `alwaysBounce*` props are `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 當為 `true` 時，滾動視圖在到達內容邊界時會彈跳（若內容大於滾動方向上的視圖尺寸）。設為 `false` 時會禁用所有彈跳效果，即使 `alwaysBounce*` 屬性設為 `true` 也無效。

segments.source_content: When `true`, gestures can drive zoom past min/max and the zoom will animate to the min/max value at gesture end, otherwise the zoom will not exceed the limits.

translations.zh-hant: 當為 `true` 時，手勢操作可暫時縮放超過最小/最大值，並在手勢結束時動畫回彈至限制值；否則縮放比例絕不會超出限制範圍。

segments.source_content: When `false`, once tracking starts, won't try to drag if the touch moves.

translations.zh-hant: 設為 `false` 時，一旦開始追蹤觸控，即使手指移動也不會觸發拖曳。

segments.source_content: When `true`, the scroll view automatically centers the content when the content is smaller than the scroll view bounds; when the content is larger than the scroll view, this property has no effect.

translations.zh-hant: 當為 `true` 時，若內容小於滾動視圖邊界會自動置中；若內容大於滾動視圖則此屬性無效。

segments.source_content: These styles will be applied to the scroll view content container which wraps all of the child views. Example:

translations.zh-hant: 這些樣式會套用至包裹所有子視圖的滾動視圖內容容器。範例：

segments.source_content: The amount by which the scroll view content is inset from the edges of the scroll view.

translations.zh-hant: 設定滾動視圖內容與邊緣的內縮距離。

segments.source_content: This property specifies how the safe area insets are used to modify the content area of the scroll view. Available on iOS 11 and later.

translations.zh-hant: 此屬性指定如何利用安全區域邊距來調整滾動視圖的內容區域。僅適用於 iOS 11 及以上版本。

segments.source_content: Used to manually set the starting scroll offset.

translations.zh-hant: 用於手動設定初始滾動偏移量。

segments.source_content: A floating-point number that determines how quickly the scroll view decelerates after the user lifts their finger. You may also use string shortcuts `"normal"` and `"fast"` which match the underlying iOS settings for `UIScrollViewDecelerationRateNormal` and `UIScrollViewDecelerationRateFast` respectively.

translations.zh-hant: 決定用戶鬆手後滾動視圖減速快慢的浮點數。亦可使用字串快捷參數 `"normal"` 和 `"fast"`，分別對應 iOS 底層的 `UIScrollViewDecelerationRateNormal` 和 `UIScrollViewDecelerationRateFast` 設定值。

segments.source_content:
- `'normal'` 0.998 on iOS, 0.985 on Android.
- `'fast'`, 0.99 on iOS, 0.9 on Android.

translations.zh-hant:
- `'normal'`：iOS 為 0.998，Android 為 0.985
- `'fast'`：iOS 為 0.99，Android 為 0.9

segments.source_content: When true, the ScrollView will try to lock to only vertical or horizontal scrolling while dragging.

translations.zh-hant: 設為 `true` 時，滾動視圖在拖曳期間會鎖定單一方向（垂直或水平）的滾動。

segments.source_content: When true, the scroll view stops on the next index (in relation to scroll position at release) regardless of how fast the gesture is. This can be used for pagination when the page is less than the width of the horizontal ScrollView or the height of the vertical ScrollView.

translations.zh-hant: 當設定為 true 時，無論手勢速度多快，滾動視圖都會在釋放時相對於滾動位置的下一個索引處停止。這可用於當頁面寬度小於水平 ScrollView 寬度或頁面高度小於垂直 ScrollView 高度時的分頁效果。

segments.source_content: When true, the default JS pan responder on the ScrollView is disabled, and full control over touches inside the ScrollView is left to its child components. This is particularly useful if `snapToInterval` is enabled, since it does not follow typical touch patterns. Do not use this on regular ScrollView use cases without `snapToInterval` as it may cause unexpected touches to occur while scrolling.

translations.zh-hant: 當設定為 true 時，會停用 ScrollView 上預設的 JS 手勢響應器，並將 ScrollView 內部的觸控事件完全交由子元件控制。這在啟用 `snapToInterval` 時特別有用，因為該模式不符合常規觸控行為模式。請勿在未啟用 `snapToInterval` 的常規 ScrollView 使用情境中使用此屬性，否則可能導致滾動時發生非預期的觸控事件。

segments.source_content: Sometimes a scrollview takes up more space than its content fills. When this is the case, this prop will fill the rest of the scrollview with a color to avoid setting a background and creating unnecessary overdraw. This is an advanced optimization that is not needed in the general case.

translations.zh-hant: 當滾動視圖佔用空間大於內容區域時，此屬性會用指定顏色填充剩餘空間，避免設定背景色造成不必要的過度繪製。這屬於進階優化手段，一般情境無需使用。

segments.source_content: Fades out the edges of the scroll content.

translations.zh-hant: 使滾動內容邊緣產生漸隱效果。

segments.source_content: If the value is greater than `0`, the fading edges will be set accordingly to the current scroll direction and position, indicating if there is more content to show.

translations.zh-hant: 若值大於 0，會根據當前滾動方向與位置顯示漸隱邊緣，提示尚有更多內容可供瀏覽。

segments.source_content: When `true`, the scroll view's children are arranged horizontally in a row instead of vertically in a column.

translations.zh-hant: 當設定為 true 時，滾動視圖的子元件會以水平排列方式佈局，而非預設的垂直排列。

segments.source_content: The style of the scroll indicators.

- `'default'` same as `black`.
- `'black'`, scroll indicator is `black`. This style is good against a light background.
- `'white'`, scroll indicator is `white`. This style is good against a dark background.

translations.zh-hant:
- `'default'` 等同於 `black`
- `'black'` 黑色滾動指示器，適合淺色背景
- `'white'` 白色滾動指示器，適合深色背景

segments.source_content: If sticky headers should stick at the bottom instead of the top of the ScrollView. This is usually used with inverted ScrollViews.

translations.zh-hant: 設定黏性標頭是否應固定在 ScrollView 底部而非頂部。通常與反向 ScrollView 搭配使用。

segments.source_content: Determines whether the keyboard gets dismissed in response to a drag.

translations.zh-hant: 決定拖曳行為是否導致鍵盤收起。

segments.source_content:
- `'none'`, drags do not dismiss the keyboard.
- `'on-drag'`, the keyboard is dismissed when a drag begins.

translations.zh-hant:
- `'none'` 拖曳時不收起鍵盤
- `'on-drag'` 開始拖曳時立即收起鍵盤

segments.source_content: - `'interactive'`, the keyboard is dismissed interactively with the drag and moves in synchrony with the touch, dragging upwards cancels the dismissal. On Android this is not supported and it will have the same behavior as `'none'`.

translations.zh-hant: - `'interactive'` 鍵盤會隨拖曳動作互動式收起，向上拖曳可取消收起動作。Android 不支援此模式，行為將與 `'none'` 相同。

segments.source_content: Determines when the keyboard should stay visible after a tap.

translations.zh-hant: 決定點擊後鍵盤應保持顯示的時機。

segments.source_content:
- `'never'` tapping outside of the focused text input when the keyboard is up dismisses the keyboard. When this happens, children won't receive the tap.
- `'always'`, the keyboard will not dismiss automatically, and the scroll view will not catch taps, but children of the scroll view can catch taps.
- `'handled'`, the keyboard will not dismiss automatically when the tap was handled by children of the scroll view (or captured by an ancestor).
- `false`, **_deprecated_**, use `'never'` instead
- `true`, **_deprecated_**, use `'always'` instead

translations.zh-hant:
- `'never'` 當鍵盤開啟時，點擊聚焦的文字輸入框外部會關閉鍵盤。此時子元件不會接收到點擊事件。
- `'always'` 鍵盤不會自動關閉，且滾動視圖不會攔截點擊事件，但滾動視圖的子元件可以捕獲點擊。
- `'handled'` 當點擊事件被滾動視圖的子元件（或被上層元件捕獲）處理時，鍵盤不會自動關閉。
- `false` **_已棄用_**，請改用 `'never'`
- `true` **_已棄用_**，請改用 `'always'`

segments.source_content: When set, the scroll view will adjust the scroll position so that the first child that is currently visible and at or beyond `minIndexForVisible` will not change position. This is useful for lists that are loading content in both directions, e.g. a chat thread, where new messages coming in might otherwise cause the scroll position to jump. A value of 0 is common, but other values such as 1 can be used to skip loading spinners or other content that should not maintain position.

translations.zh-hant: 設定此屬性後，滾動視圖會調整滾動位置，使當前可見且位於或超過 `minIndexForVisible` 的第一個子元件保持位置不變。這適用於雙向載入內容的列表（例如聊天串），避免新訊息進入時導致滾動位置跳動。常見值為 0，但也可設為 1 以跳過不應保持位置的載入指示器或其他內容。

segments.source_content: The optional `autoscrollToTopThreshold` can be used to make the content automatically scroll to the top after making the adjustment if the user was within the threshold of the top before the adjustment was made. This is also useful for chat-like applications where you want to see new messages scroll into place, but not if the user has scrolled up a ways and it would be disruptive to scroll a bunch.

translations.zh-hant: 可選參數 `autoscrollToTopThreshold` 可在調整後，若使用者原本位於頂部閾值範圍內時，自動將內容滾動至頂部。這同樣適用於聊天類應用，希望新訊息能平滑滾入視圖，但若使用者已向上滾動較多時則不打擾。

segments.source_content: Caveat 1: Reordering elements in the scrollview with this enabled will probably cause jumpiness and jank. It can be fixed, but there are currently no plans to do so. For now, don't re-order the content of any ScrollViews or Lists that use this feature.

translations.zh-hant: 注意事項 1：啟用此功能時重新排序滾動視圖中的元件可能會導致跳動。此問題可修復，但目前無相關計劃。現階段請勿對使用此功能的滾動視圖或列表重新排序內容。

segments.source_content: Caveat 2: This uses `contentOffset` and `frame.origin` in native code to compute visibility. Occlusion, transforms, and other complexity won't be taken into account as to whether content is "visible" or not.

translations.zh-hant: 注意事項 2：此功能透過原生代碼中的 `contentOffset` 和 `frame.origin` 計算可見性。遮擋、變形等複雜因素不會被納入內容是否「可見」的判斷。

segments.source_content: Enables nested scrolling for Android API level 21+.

translations.zh-hant: 為 Android API 等級 21+ 啟用嵌套滾動功能。

segments.source_content: Called when scrollable content view of the ScrollView changes.

translations.zh-hant: 當 ScrollView 的可滾動內容視圖尺寸變化時呼叫。

segments.source_content: The handler function will receive two parameters: the content width and content height `(contentWidth, contentHeight)`.

translations.zh-hant: 處理函式會接收兩個參數：內容寬度與內容高度 `(contentWidth, contentHeight)`。

segments.source_content: It's implemented using onLayout handler attached to the content container which this ScrollView renders.

translations.zh-hant: 其實作方式是透過附加到 ScrollView 渲染的內容容器上的 onLayout 處理器。

segments.source_content: Called when the momentum scroll starts (scroll which occurs as the ScrollView starts gliding).

translations.zh-hant: 當動量滾動開始時呼叫（即 ScrollView 開始滑行時的滾動）。

segments.source_content: Called when the momentum scroll ends (scroll which occurs as the ScrollView glides to a stop).

translations.zh-hant: 當動量滾動結束時呼叫（即 ScrollView 滑行至停止時的滾動）。

segments.source_content: Fires at most once per frame during scrolling. The event has the following shape (all values are numbers):

translations.zh-hant: 滾動期間每幀最多觸發一次。事件格式如下（所有值均為數字）：

segments.source_content: Called when the user begins to drag the scroll view.

translations.zh-hant: 當用戶開始拖動滾動視圖時調用。

segments.source_content: Called when the user stops dragging the scroll view and it either stops or begins to glide.

translations.zh-hant: 當用戶停止拖動滾動視圖且其停止或開始滑動時調用。

segments.source_content: Fires when the scroll view scrolls to top after the status bar has been tapped.

translations.zh-hant: 當滾動視圖因點擊狀態列而滾動至頂部時觸發。

segments.source_content: Used to override default value of overScroll mode.

translations.zh-hant: 用於覆寫默認的過度滾動模式值。

segments.source_content:
- `'auto'` - Allow a user to over-scroll this view only if the content is large enough to meaningfully scroll.
- `'always'` - Always allow a user to over-scroll this view.
- `'never'` - Never allow a user to over-scroll this view.

translations.zh-hant:
- `'auto'` - 僅當內容足夠大時，才允許用戶對此視圖進行過度滾動。
- `'always'` - 始終允許用戶對此視圖進行過度滾動。
- `'never'` - 永不允許用戶對此視圖進行過度滾動。

segments.source_content: When true, the scroll view stops on multiples of the scroll view's size when scrolling. This can be used for horizontal pagination.

translations.zh-hant: 當設置為 true 時，滾動視圖會在滾動時停在滾動視圖大小的倍數位置。這可用於水平分頁。

segments.source_content: Causes the scrollbars not to turn transparent when they are not in use.

translations.zh-hant: 使滾動條在不使用時不會變透明。

segments.source_content: When true, ScrollView allows use of pinch gestures to zoom in and out.

translations.zh-hant: 當設置為 true 時，ScrollView 允許使用捏合手勢進行縮放。

segments.source_content: A RefreshControl component, used to provide pull-to-refresh functionality for the ScrollView. Only works for vertical ScrollViews (`horizontal` prop must be `false`).

translations.zh-hant: 一個 RefreshControl 組件，用於為 ScrollView 提供下拉刷新功能。僅適用於垂直 ScrollView（`horizontal` 屬性必須為 `false`）。

segments.source_content: Experimental: When `true`, offscreen child views (whose `overflow` value is `hidden`) are removed from their native backing superview when offscreen. This can improve scrolling performance on long lists.

translations.zh-hant: 實驗性功能：當設置為 `true` 時，離屏的子視圖（其 `overflow` 值為 `hidden`）將從其原生父視圖中移除。這可以提高長列表的滾動性能。

segments.source_content: When false, the view cannot be scrolled via touch interaction.

translations.zh-hant: 當設置為 false 時，無法通過觸摸交互滾動視圖。

segments.source_content: Note that the view can always be scrolled by calling `scrollTo`.

translations.zh-hant: 注意：視圖仍可通過調用 `scrollTo` 來滾動。

segments.source_content: Limits how often scroll events will be fired while scrolling, specified as a time interval in ms. This may be useful when expensive work is performed in response to scrolling. Values ≤ `16` will disable throttling, regardless of the refresh rate of the device.

translations.zh-hant: 限制滾動時觸發滾動事件的頻率，以毫秒為單位指定時間間隔。這在滾動時需要執行昂貴操作時非常有用。值 ≤ `16` 將禁用節流，無論設備的刷新率如何。

segments.source_content: The amount by which the scroll view indicators are inset from the edges of the scroll view. This should normally be set to the same value as the `contentInset`.

translations.zh-hant: 滾動視圖指示器從滾動視圖邊緣的內嵌距離。通常應設置為與 `contentInset` 相同的值。

segments.source_content: Tag used to log scroll performance on this scroll view. Will force momentum events to be turned on (see sendMomentumEvents). This doesn't do anything out of the box and you need to implement a custom native FpsListener for it to be useful.

translations.zh-hant: 用於記錄此滾動視圖滾動性能的標籤。將強制開啟動量事件（參見sendMomentumEvents）。預設情況下此功能無效，需實作自定義的原生FpsListener才能發揮作用。

segments.source_content: When `true`, the scroll view can be programmatically scrolled beyond its content size.

translations.zh-hant: 設為`true`時，可通過程式控制滾動視圖超出其內容尺寸。

segments.source_content: When `true`, the scroll view scrolls to top when the status bar is tapped.

translations.zh-hant: 設為`true`時，點擊狀態列會使滾動視圖滾動至頂部。

segments.source_content: When `true`, shows a horizontal scroll indicator.

translations.zh-hant: 設為`true`時，顯示水平滾動指示器。

segments.source_content: When `true`, shows a vertical scroll indicator.

translations.zh-hant: 設為`true`時，顯示垂直滾動指示器。

segments.source_content: When `snapToInterval` is set, `snapToAlignment` will define the relationship of the snapping to the scroll view.

translations.zh-hant: 當設置`snapToInterval`時，`snapToAlignment`將定義對齊方式與滾動視圖的關係。

segments.source_content:
- `'start'` will align the snap at the left (horizontal) or top (vertical).
- `'center'` will align the snap in the center.
- `'end'` will align the snap at the right (horizontal) or bottom (vertical).

translations.zh-hant:
- `'start'` 將對齊至左側（水平）或頂部（垂直）。
- `'center'` 將對齊至中心。
- `'end'` 將對齊至右側（水平）或底部（垂直）。

segments.source_content: Use in conjunction with `snapToOffsets`. By default, the end of the list counts as a snap offset. Set `snapToEnd` to false to disable this behavior and allow the list to scroll freely between its end and the last `snapToOffsets` offset.

translations.zh-hant: 需與`snapToOffsets`配合使用。預設情況下，列表末端會視為吸附偏移點。設為`false`可禁用此行為，允許列表在末端與最後一個`snapToOffsets`偏移點之間自由滾動。

segments.source_content: When set, causes the scroll view to stop at multiples of the value of `snapToInterval`. This can be used for paginating through children that have lengths smaller than the scroll view. Typically used in combination with `snapToAlignment` and `decelerationRate="fast"`. Overrides less configurable `pagingEnabled` prop.

translations.zh-hant: 設置後，滾動視圖將在`snapToInterval`值的倍數處停止。可用於分頁瀏覽尺寸小於滾動視圖的子元件。通常與`snapToAlignment`和`decelerationRate="fast"`配合使用。會覆蓋較少配置選項的`pagingEnabled`屬性。

segments.source_content: When set, causes the scroll view to stop at the defined offsets. This can be used for paginating through variously sized children that have lengths smaller than the scroll view. Typically used in combination with `decelerationRate="fast"`. Overrides less configurable `pagingEnabled` and `snapToInterval` props.

translations.zh-hant: 設置後，滾動視圖將在定義的偏移點停止。可用於分頁瀏覽尺寸各異且小於滾動視圖的子元件。通常與`decelerationRate="fast"`配合使用。會覆蓋`pagingEnabled`和`snapToInterval`屬性。

segments.source_content: Use in conjunction with `snapToOffsets`. By default, the beginning of the list counts as a snap offset. Set `snapToStart` to `false` to disable this behavior and allow the list to scroll freely between its start and the first `snapToOffsets` offset.

translations.zh-hant: 需與`snapToOffsets`配合使用。預設情況下，列表起始處會視為吸附偏移點。設為`false`可禁用此行為，允許列表在起始處與第一個`snapToOffsets`偏移點之間自由滾動。

segments.source_content: When set to `true`, sticky header will be hidden when scrolling down the list, and it will dock at the top of the list when scrolling up.

translations.zh-hant: 設為`true`時，向下滾動列表會隱藏黏性標頭，向上滾動時會將標頭固定在列表頂部。

segments.source_content: An array of child indices determining which children get docked to the top of the screen when scrolling. For example, passing `stickyHeaderIndices={[0]}` will cause the first child to be fixed to the top of the scroll view. You can also use like [x,y,z] to make multiple items sticky when they are at the top. This property is not supported in conjunction with `horizontal={true}`.

translations.zh-hant: 一個子元素索引陣列，決定哪些子元素在滾動時會固定在畫面頂部。例如傳入 `stickyHeaderIndices={[0]}` 會讓第一個子元素固定在滾動視圖頂部。也可使用 [x,y,z] 格式讓多個元素在抵達頂部時固定。此屬性不支援與 `horizontal={true}` 同時使用。

segments.source_content: The current scale of the scroll view content.

translations.zh-hant: 滾動視圖內容的當前縮放比例。

segments.source_content:
```tsx
scrollTo(
  options?: {x?: number, y?: number, animated?: boolean} | number,
  deprecatedX?: number,
  deprecatedAnimated?: boolean,
);
```
Scrolls to a given x, y offset, either immediately, with a smooth animation.

translations.zh-hant: 滾動到指定的 x、y 偏移位置，可選擇立即執行或使用平滑動畫。

segments.source_content: > Note: The weird function signature is due to the fact that, for historical reasons, the function also accepts separate arguments as an alternative to the options object. This is deprecated due to ambiguity (y before x), and SHOULD NOT BE USED.

translations.zh-hant: > 注意：此函數簽名較為特殊是由於歷史原因，它同時支援以獨立參數替代選項物件。但因此設計會造成歧義（y 在 x 之前），此用法已被棄用，不應繼續使用。

segments.source_content: If this is a vertical ScrollView scrolls to the bottom. If this is a horizontal ScrollView scrolls to the right.

translations.zh-hant: 若為垂直 ScrollView 則滾動至底部；若為水平 ScrollView 則滾動至右側。

segments.source_content: Use `scrollToEnd({animated: true})` for smooth animated scrolling, `scrollToEnd({animated: false})` for immediate scrolling. If no options are passed, `animated` defaults to `true`.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 `scrollToEnd({animated: true})` 可啟用平滑動畫滾動，`scrollToEnd({animated: false})` 則立即滾動。若未傳入選項，`animated` 預設為 `true`。
